perturbation.original_text: Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, Todos hereby grants the Reseller a non-sublicensable, non-transferable, exclusive right to distribute and sell the Products to Customers in the Territory; provided, however, that Reseller may sub-license or transfer its distribution rights to a subsidiary or affiliate of the Reseller.
perturbation.changed_text: Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, Todos hereby grants the Distributor a non-sublicensable, non-transferable, exclusive right to distribute and sell the Products to Clients in the Territory; provided, however, that Distributor may sub-license or transfer its distribution rights to a subsidiary or affiliate of the Reseller.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'Reseller', 'Distributor', 'Customers', and 'Clients' are used interchangeably. The definition of Reseller grants it the right to sub-license or transfer its rights. However, if 'Distributor' is a separate entity, it is unclear whether the reseller's right applies to them.

perturbation.original_text: Todos shall provide the Reseller, at no charge, with initial training relating to the efficient use and operation of the Products as well as instruction regarding use of all associated equipment required to effectively carry out the TM-B1 and TM-B2 cancer screening tests. Additionally, Todos will provide the Reseller with training relating to the handling of all blood samples throughout the screening process, and any and all other training, guidance and support reasonably required to sell the Products in the Territory.
perturbation.changed_text: Todos shall provide the Reseller, at no charge, with initial training relating to the efficient use and operation of the Goods as well as instruction regarding use of all associated equipment required to effectively carry out the TM-B1 and TM-B2 cancer screening tests. Additionally, Todos will provide the Vendor with training relating to the handling of all blood samples throughout the screening process, and any and all other training, guidance and support reasonably required to sell the Goods in the Territory.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'Products' and 'Goods' are used interchangeably, while 'Reseller' and 'Vendor' are also now interchanged. This creates confusion as to what exactly Todos is providing training on, and to whom. The initial training is described for Products but later shifted to Goods and the training recipient shifted to Vendor. Are they the same, or different things?

perturbation.original_text: The Reseller shall use all commercially reasonable efforts to market, promote, distribute, and sell the Products to Customers in the Territory, and shall, on its own account, provide a trained and competent sales and marketing team for the efficient promotion and sale of the Products. The Reseller shall achieve the commercialization milestones by the dates set forth in the Commercialization Timetable attached hereto as Exhibit C.
perturbation.changed_text: The Dealer shall use all commercially reasonable efforts to market, promote, distribute, and sell the Deliverables to Buyers in the Territory, and shall, on its own account, provide a trained and competent sales and marketing team for the efficient promotion and sale of the Deliverables. The Reseller shall achieve the commercialization milestones by the dates set forth in the Commercialization Timetable attached hereto as Exhibit C.
perturbation.explanation: The terms 'Reseller' and 'Dealer' are used interchangeably, as well as 'Products' and 'Deliverables', alongside 'Customers' and 'Buyers'. This creates confusion as to what is expected from the original 'Reseller', since new terminology implies a different role and product.
